name: Very low quality sPaCe game
description:
This a shit-post rather than anything , it has bad controls , graphics and don´t get me started in the story!, so no expect nothing just DON´T PLAY THE GAME.

Well if you are interested still I will explain the setting. In space a evil,(but also kind of pathetic ) conquers a space station, evryone nows that she can´t do anything , so they send a new pilot to reconquer with the help of the commander William ,(consecutive winner of the trophy Idiot of the Espacial Police Force).
